ComicInfo.Title: The Death of Captain Tarpals; Deal with a Demon; Lady Luck; Three against the Galaxy
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jar Jar Binks discovers that the bonds of friendship can only be stretched so far.
Villie must smuggle a Princess off her home planet.
Lando Calrissian gambles for an immense prize: Cloud City!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 07:33:56. [CVDB97446] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:41:04. [Issue ID 214988]
